sentences.sContent: The martinet governed his classroom with procrustean discipline, assigning a week's detention to all offenders, no matter what the offense.
sentences.sContent_eng: The martinet governed his classroom with procrustean discipline, assigning a week's detention to all offenders, no matter what the offense.
sentences.sCn: 纪律严肃的人用强求一致的训导支配他的教室，分配一个星期内拘留所有的罪犯，无论如何进攻。

synos.tran: 强求一致的；迫使就范的；残暴的

phrases.pCn: [希腊神话]强求一致的政策；普罗克汝斯忒斯之床

remMethod.val: 源自Procrustes(希腊神话中的巨人)， 抓到人后， 缚之床榻， 体长者截下肢， 体短者拔之使与床齐长

trans.tranCn: 残暴的, 强求一致的
